summary: An email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York to a team regarding the Epstein case, providing contact information and expressing appreciation for a meeting. It indicates ongoing coordination and investigation.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, working on the Epstein case in the Southern District of New York, coordinating with a team.

events.title: Team Meeting on Epstein Case
events.description: A meeting occurred the day before this email, involving the Assistant U.S. Attorney and a team to discuss the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York was actively working on the Epstein case as of July 2019.
A team meeting regarding the case was held on July 13, 2019, indicating ongoing investigation and coordination.
The email serves as a follow-up to provide contact information for the legal team handling the case.
